name: Testing stock_list function
description:
Testing stock_list function with various test data [with list_of_art=['ABAR 200', 'CDXE 500', 'BKWR 250', 'BTSQ 890', 'DRTY 600'], list_of_cat=['A', 'B'], expected='(A : 200) - (B : 1140)'].

        :return:
descriptionHtml:
Codewars badge:

Test Description:

You will be given a stock-list (e.g. : L) and a list of categories in capital letters. Your task is to verify that the function finds all the books of L with codes belonging to each category of M and to sum their quantity according to each category.

steps.name: Enter test data (['ABAR 200', 'CDXE 500', 'BKWR 250', 'BTSQ 890', 'DRTY 600'], ['A', 'B']) and verify the expected output ((A : 200) - (B : 1140)) vs actual result ((A : 200) - (B : 1140))
